function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Less abrupt onset of symptoms","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of dedicated walk-in clinics, inadequate training for medical workers, lack of specialized infrastructure, inadequate testing and surveillance, lack of case isolation, insufficient visitor controls, inadequate ppe exchange and disinfection","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate medical facilities, poor communication, lack of encrypted communication for top management","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ineffective outbreak role index ori measurement leading to inadequate support and flexibility in healthcare","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring and detection of contagious diseases due to lack of technology for remote continuous patient monitoring","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate protocols for identifying, transporting, and managing covid-19 positive cases","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ineffective monitoring and surveillance of contagious diseases","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of quantity in technological advancements for medical field during pandemic outbreaks","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Challenges in tight isolation and containment of covid-19 patients","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of research on factors influencing ppe production, distribution, and usage","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Feasibility and cost issues in implementing strategic protocols","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Search databases may not cover all relevant articles related to contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limiting nosocomial spread of infection","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Outbreak of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Adverse impact on healthcare industry","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Optimizing hyperparameters using grid search","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Evaluation of lda models","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Delays in the availability of data on intimate partner violence due to limited implementation of surveys.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Closure of schools and continued stay-at-home orders","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Closure of women shelters during the pandemic severely limited services provided to callers","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Delay in accessing microlevel data for calls during 2020","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited availability of microdata for 2020","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited availability of data by state for analysis","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited access to services and facilities due to lockdown measures","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lower quality green space in poorer communities","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reduced access to antenatal care services leading to increased risk of undernutrition in mothers and children","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources, especially doctors and nurses, leading to lack of timely diagnosis and treatment for covid-19 infectors.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Privacy and data security concerns with smart monitors at home doors","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of unmanned aerial vehicles uav and robots for surveillance and enforcement of lockdown policies may lead to privacy concerns and violations.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Large-scale data transmission and analysis through the 5g network may pose cybersecurity risks and vulnerabilities.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources due to pandemic and logistics challenges","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Difficulty in meeting basic living needs due to lockdown policies","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Disruption of work and production due to pandemic and lockdown policies","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of 5g-based thermal imaging for human body temperature measurement may result in privacy concerns and data security risks.","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of 5g-based driverless vehicles and unmanned distribution robots for delivery may lead to increased potential for disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rapid adoption of 5g-based technologies may lead to increased reliance on efficient but vulnerable digital infrastructure, posing a risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact of contagious diseases on built environment","category":"Soil","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Importance of healthy environment in disease control","category":"Soil","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate design of built environment affecting immune system","category":"Soil","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Hygiene issues related to the built environment","category":"Soil","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of hygienic solutions in the built environment leading to increased transmission risk of infectious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Soil","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate protection from contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Soil","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene maintenance in the built environment","category":"Soil","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of healthy building design","category":"Soil","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of insurance coverage for the pandemic","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High mortality rate due to covid-19","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased susceptibility of vulnerable groups to health hazards","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited capacity of health care systems in low and middle-income countries","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through close contact, respiratory droplets, fomites, and contaminated surfaces","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Possibility of airborne transmission through airborne particles with diameters smaller than 5 μm","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Low"}]}
